titleStmt.title: Act of the Committee of Estates against run-awayes, and fugitive souldiers, and their resetters. Edinburgh, 11. Iuly, 1648.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Requiring deserters from the army in Scotland to be apprehended and imposing penalties on those who failed to enforce that statute; also imposing restrictions on travel in Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
